name: VFX WORKSHOPS Gift Card
description: After your purchase please send email to info@vfxworkshops.com and include the Full Name and email of the individual you are making this purchase / gift car for. Happy Holidays !

name: VFX Workshops Distressed-Pack-01
description: This collection contains 15 High Resolution JPF format Image files. Carefully designed and crafted to maximize your workflow, and just the right level of distress with intense grit, noise, splatter These will add an aggressive style to your designs, typography, art, and photographs. Easily convert them in Illustrator to vector files for a great distressed effect for your T-Shirt designs. Simply drop and overlay these amazing textures on top of your designs. This pack is an instant downloadable product. Dimensions: 2550 x 3300 (Pixels) at 300 DPI (jpg file format) We do not offer any refunds with digital downloads. VISIT OUR BLOG FOR LATEST NEWS

name: Alp Allen Altiner Sketchbook Volume 01
description: This is a high quality, 8.5x11, 32 page full color cover and b&w interior Sketchbook with various comic book related sketches, doodles and artwork. Ships same day ! VISIT OUR BLOG FOR LATEST NEWS

name: VFX Workshops Matte Painting Basics with SKYPE
description: Now easily sign up and send your payment securely for the Matte Painting Master Class by Instructor Alp Allen Altiner. $899 6 weeks For Feature Films and Video Game Development Enrollment OPEN Join our running classes This Master Workshops starts in April 1st,2013 In this Workshop Alp demonstrates how to design a shot, starting with a photo reference and digital painting techniques and goes over creating dynamic composition. He shows you how to quickly use the photo as a base utilizing various elements within the reference, setting up a perspective guide, and block in shapes, adding lighting and atmospheric effects using Photoshop. Learn how to lead the viewers eye to the focal point, by creating a pathway using shapes, colors and atmosphere within your painting. You will explore both daytime and night shots, and learn how to think creatively on how to come up with various ideas, applying Photoshop painting techniques to translate them into a final scene. This Workshop is a great exercise both for the beginning and intermediate digital artist, wanting to learn how to block in ideas and make them look convincing with a Photo real approach. This Workshop includes several exercise files which are provided for each weekâ€™s assignment. Your goal is to understand the basics of creating the base for a matte painting, and learning how to create realistic Matte Painting concepts. CLICK HERE for more detailed information
